    27 * @return {void}

    291module.exports = function(object, fn, scope) {
    30
    310 if(NX.isEmpty(object)) {
    320 return;
    33 }
    34
    350 if(scope === undefined) {
    360 scope = object;
    37 }
    38
    390 if(NX.isIterable(object)) {
    40
    410 NX.Array.each.call(NX.Array, object, fn, scope);
    42
    43 } else {
    44
    450 NX.Object.each.call(NX.Object, object, fn, scope);
    46
    47 }
    48};

    17 * @method difference
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = function(arrayA, arrayB) {
    25
    260 var slice = Array.prototype.slice;
    270 var erase = function(array, index, removeCount) {
    280 array.splice(index, removeCount);
    290 return array;
    30 };
    310 var clone = slice.call(arrayA),
    32 ln = clone.length,
    33 i, j, lnB;
    34
    350 for(i = 0, lnB = arrayB.length; i < lnB; i++) {
    36
    370 for(j = 0; j < ln; j++) {
    38
    390 if(clone[j] === arrayB[i]) {
    40
    410 erase(clone, j, 1);
    420 j--;
    430 ln--;
    44
    45 }
    46 }
    47 }

    490 return clone;
    50};

    260 array = NX.Array.from(array);
    27
    280 var i, ln = array.length;
    29
    300 if(reverse !== true) {
    31
    320 for(i = 0; i < ln; i++) {

    350 return i;
    36 }
    37

    41
    420 for(i = ln - 1; i > -1; i--) {

    440 if(fn.call(scope || array[i], array[i], i, array) === false) {
    450 return i;
    46 }
    47
    48 }

    260 var d = NX.Date.clone(date),
    27 Date = NX.Date;
    28
    290 if(!interval || value === 0) {
    300 return d;
    31 }
    32
    330 switch(interval.toLowerCase()) {
    34
    35 case NX.Date.MILLI:
    360 d.setMilliseconds(d.getMilliseconds() + value);
    370 break;

    39 case NX.Date.SECOND:
    400 d.setSeconds(d.getSeconds() + value);
    410 break;
    42
    43 case NX.Date.MINUTE:
    440 d.setMinutes(d.getMinutes() + value);
    450 break;
    46
    47 case NX.Date.HOUR:

    50

    530 break;
    54

    57
    580 if(day > 28) {
    590 day = Math.min(
    60 day,
    61 NX.Date.getLastDateOfMonth(
    62 NX.Date.add(
    63 NX.Date.getFirstDateOfMonth(date),
    64 'mo',
    65 value
    66 )
    67 ).getDate()
    68 );
    69 }
    70
    710 d.setDate(day);
    720 d.setMonth(date.getMonth() + value);
    730 break;
    74
    75 case NX.Date.YEAR:
    760 d.setFullYear(date.getFullYear() + value);
    770 break;
    78 }
    79
    800 return d;

    58 "v = NX.Date.add(v, NX.Date.SECOND, -v.getTimezoneOffset() * 60 - zz);",
    59 "} else if(o) {",
    60 "v = NX.Date.add(v, NX.Date.MINUTE, -v.getTimezoneOffset() + (sn == '+'? -1 : 1) * (hr * 60 + mn));",
    61 "}",
    62 "}",
    63
    64 "return v;"
    65
    66 ].join('\n');
    67
    681 return function(format) {
    69
    700 var me = this;
    710 var regexNum = NX.Date.parseRegexes.length,
    72 currentGroup = 1,
    73 calc = [],
    74 regex = [],
    75 special = false,
    76 ch = "";
    77
    780 for(var i = 0; i < format.length; ++i) {
    79
    800 ch = format.charAt(i);
    81
    820 if(!special && ch == "\\") {
    83
    840 special = true;
    85
    860 } else if(special) {
    87
    880 special = false;
    890 regex.push(NX.String.escape(ch));
    90
    91 } else {
    92
    930 var obj = NX.Date.formatCodeToRegex(ch, currentGroup);
    94
    950 currentGroup += obj.g;
    96
    970 regex.push(obj.s);
    98
    990 if(obj.g && obj.c) {
    100
    1010 calc.push(obj.c);
    102
    103 }
    104 }
    105 }
    106
    1070 NX.Date.parseRegexes[regexNum] = new RegExp("^" + regex.join('') + "$", 'i');
    1080 NX.Date.parseFunctions[format] = NX.functionFactory("input", "strict", me.$xf(code, regexNum, calc.join('')));
    109 };
    110
    111})();
    112
    113// }}}
    114
    115/*
    116 * Local variables:
    117 * tab-width: 4
    118 * c-basic-offset: 4
    119 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil

    7 * http://www.xenophy.com

    10// {{{ NX.Date.getGMTOffset
    11
    12/**
    13 * @class NX.Date
    14 */
    15
    16/**
    17 * @method getGMTOffset
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = function(date, colon) {
    25
    260 var offset = date.getTimezoneOffset();
    27
    280 return (offset > 0 ? "-" : "+")
    29 + NX.String.leftPad(Math.floor(Math.abs(offset) / 60), 2, "0")
    30 + (colon ? ":" : "")
    31 + NX.String.leftPad(Math.abs(offset % 60), 2, "0");
    32};
    33
    34// }}}

    37 * Local variables:
    38 * tab-width: 4

    nx/Date/getWeekOfYear.js

    60%
    5
    3
    2
    LineHitsSource
    1/* vim: set expandtab tabstop=4 shiftwidth=4 softtabstop=4: */
    2
    3/*!
    4 * Next JS
    5 *
    6 * Copyright (c)2012 Xenophy.CO.,LTD All rights Reserved.
    7 * http://www.xenophy.com
    8 */
    9
    10// {{{ NX.Date.getWeekOfYear
    11
    12/**
    13 * @class NX.Date
    14 */
    15
    16/**
    17 * @method getWeekOfYear
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = (function() {
    25
    261 var ms1d = 864e5,
    27 ms7d = 7 * ms1d;
    28
    291 return function(date) {
    30
    310 var DC3 = Date.UTC(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth(), date.getDate() + 3) / ms1d,
    32 AWN = Math.floor(DC3 / 7), // an Absolute Week Number
    33 Wyr = new Date(AWN * ms7d).getUTCFullYear();
    34
    350 return AWN - Math.floor(Date.UTC(Wyr, 0, 7) / ms7d) + 1;
    36 };
    37})();
    38
    39// }}}
    40
    41/*
    42 * Local variables:
    43 * tab-width: 4
    44 * c-basic-offset: 4

    10// {{{ NX.Date.isValid
    11
    12/**
    13 * @class NX.Date
    14 */
    15
    16/**
    17 * @method isValid
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = function(y, m, d, h, i, s, ms) {
    25
    260 h = h || 0;
    270 i = i || 0;
    280 s = s || 0;
    290 ms = ms || 0;
    30
    310 var dt = NX.Date.add(new Date(y < 100 ? 100 : y, m - 1, d, h, i, s, ms), NX.Date.YEAR, y < 100 ? y - 100 : 0);
    32
    330 return y == dt.getFullYear() &&
    34 m == dt.getMonth() + 1 &&
    35 d == dt.getDate() &&
    36 h == dt.getHours() &&
    37 i == dt.getMinutes() &&
    38 s == dt.getSeconds() &&
    39 ms == dt.getMilliseconds();
    40};
    41
    42// }}}

    26 d: {
    27 g: 1,
    28 c: "d = parseInt(results[{0}], 10);\n",
    29 s: "(\\d{2})"
    30 },
    31
    32 j: {
    33 g:1,
    34 c:"d = parseInt(results[{0}], 10);\n",
    35 s:"(\\d{1,2})"
    36 },

    400 for(var a = [], i = 0; i < 7; a.push(NX.Date.getShortDayName(i)), ++i);

    91 g: 1,

    93 s: "(" + NX.Date.monthNames.join("|") + ")"
    94 };
    95
    96 },
    97
    98 M: function() {
    99
    1000 for(var a = [], i = 0; i < 12; a.push(NX.Date.getShortMonthName(i)), ++i);
    101
    1020 return NX.applyIf({
    103 s:"(" + a.join("|") + ")"
    104 }, NX.Date.formatCodeToRegex("F"));
    105 },
    106
    107 m: {
    108 g: 1,
    109 c: "m = parseInt(results[{0}], 10) - 1;\n",
    110 s: "(\\d{2})"

    25
    260 err = err || {};
    27
    280 if(NX.isString(err)) {
    290 err = { msg: err };
    30 }

    24
    25- {String} `key`
    26- {Mixed} `value`
    27- {Object} `object` The object itself
    28
    29 * @param {Object} scope (&#227;&#130;&#170;&#227;&#131;&#151;&#227;&#130;&#183;&#227;&#131;&#167;&#227;&#131;&#179;) &#227;&#130;&#179;&#227;&#131;&#188;&#227;&#131;&#171;&#227;&#131;&#144;&#227;&#131;&#131;&#227;&#130;&#175;&#233;&#150;&#162;&#230;&#149;&#176;&#229;&#174;&#159;&#232;&#161;&#140;&#230;&#153;&#130;&#227;&#129;&#174;&#227;&#130;&#185;&#227;&#130;&#179;&#227;&#131;&#188;&#227;&#131;&#151;

    nx/Object/fromQueryString.js

    2%
    40
    1
    39
    LineHitsSource
    1/* vim: set expandtab tabstop=4 shiftwidth=4 softtabstop=4: */
    2
    3/*!
    4 * Next JS
    5 *
    6 * Copyright (c)2012 Xenophy.CO.,LTD All rights Reserved.
    7 * http://www.xenophy.com
    8 */
    9
    10// {{{ NX.Object.fromQueryString
    11
    12/**
    13 * @class NX.Object
    14 */
    15
    16/**
    17 * @method fromQueryString
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = function(queryString, recursive) {
    25
    260 var parts = queryString.replace(/^\?/, '').split('&'),
    27 object = {},
    28 temp, components, name, value, i, ln,
    29 part, j, subLn, matchedKeys, matchedName,
    30 keys, key, nextKey;
    31
    320 for(i = 0, ln = parts.length; i < ln; i++) {
    33
    340 part = parts[i];
    35
    360 if(part.length > 0) {
    37
    380 components = part.split('=');
    390 name = decodeURIComponent(components[0]);
    400 value = (components[1] !== undefined) ? decodeURIComponent(components[1]) : '';
    41
    420 if(!recursive) {
    43
    440 if(object.hasOwnProperty(name)) {
    45
    460 if(!NX.isArray(object[name])) {
    47
    480 object[name] = [object[name]];
    49
    50 }
    51
    520 object[name].push(value);
    53
    54 } else {
    55
    560 object[name] = value;
    57
    58 }
    59
    60 } else {
    61
    620 matchedKeys = name.match(/(\[):?([^\]]*)\]/g);
    630 matchedName = name.match(/^([^\[]+)/);
    64
    650 if(!matchedName) {
    66
    670 NX.Error.raise({
    68 sourceClass: "NX.Object",
    69 sourceMethod: "fromQueryString",
    70 queryString: queryString,
    71 recursive: recursive,
    72 msg: NX.$e("Malformed query string given, failed parsing name from \"{0}\"", part)
    73 });
    74
    75 }
    76
    770 name = matchedName[0];
    780 keys = [];
    79
    800 if(matchedKeys === null) {
    810 object[name] = value;
    820 continue;
    83 }
    84
    850 for(j = 0, subLn = matchedKeys.length; j < subLn; j++) {
    86
    870 key = matchedKeys[j];

    91 }

    1030 if(NX.isArray(temp) && key === '') {

    1050 temp.push(value);
    106

    1090 temp[key] = value;
    110
    111 }

    116

    17 * @method htmlDecode

    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = (function() {
    25
    261 var entities = {
    27 '&amp;': '&',
    28 '&gt;': '>',
    29 '&lt;': '<',
    30 '&quot;': '"'
    31 }, keys = [], p, regex;
    32
    331 for(p in entities) {
    344 keys.push(p);
    35 }
    36
    371 regex = new RegExp('(' + keys.join('|') + '|&#[0-9]{1,5};' + ')', 'g');

    40

    42
    430 if(capture in entities) {

    46
    47 } else {
    48
    490 return String.fromCharCode(parseInt(capture.substr(2), 10));
    50
    51 }

    nx/String/sprintf.js

    1%
    66
    1
    65
    LineHitsSource
    1/* vim: set expandtab tabstop=4 shiftwidth=4 softtabstop=4: */
    2
    3/*!
    4 * Next JS
    5 *
    6 * Copyright (c)2012 Xenophy.CO.,LTD All rights Reserved.
    7 * http://www.xenophy.com
    8 */
    9
    10// {{{ NX.String.sprintf
    11
    12/**
    13 * @class NX.String
    14 */
    15
    16/**
    17 * @method sprintf
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = function() {
    25
    260 var regex = /%%|%(\d+\$)?([-+\'#0 ]*)(\*\d+\$|\*|\d+)?(\.(\*\d+\$|\*|\d+))?([scboxXuidfegEG])/g;
    270 var a = arguments,
    28 i = 0,
    29 format = a[i++];
    30
    31 // pad()
    320 var pad = function(str, len, chr, leftJustify) {
    33
    340 var padding = (str.length >= len) ? '' : Array(1 + len - str.length >>> 0).join(chr);
    35
    360 return leftJustify ? str + padding : padding + str;
    37 };
    38
    39 // justify()
    400 var justify = function(value, prefix, leftJustify, minWidth, zeroPad, customPadChar) {
    41
    420 var diff = minWidth - value.length;
    43
    440 if(diff > 0) {
    450 if(leftJustify || !zeroPad) {
    460 value = pad(value, minWidth, customPadChar, leftJustify);
    47 } else {
    480 value = value.slice(0, prefix.length) + pad('', diff, '0', true) + value.slice(prefix.length);
    49 }
    50 }
    510 return value;
    52 };
    53
    54 // formatBaseX()
    550 var formatBaseX = function(value, base, prefix, leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad) {
    560 var number = value >>> 0;
    570 prefix = prefix && number && {'2': '0b', '8': '0', '16': '0x'}[base] || '';
    580 value = prefix + pad(number.toString(base), precision || 0, '0', false);
    590 return justify(value, prefix, leftJustify, minWidth, zeroPad);
    60 };
    61
    62 // formatString()
    630 var formatString = function(value, leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad, customPadChar) {
    64
    650 if(precision != null) {
    660 value = value.slice(0, precision);
    67 }
    68
    690 return justify(value, '', leftJustify, minWidth, zeroPad, customPadChar);
    70 };
    71
    72 // doFormat()
    730 var doFormat = function(substring, valueIndex, flags, minWidth, _, precision, type) {
    74
    750 var number;
    760 var prefix;
    770 var method;
    780 var textTransform;
    790 var value;
    80
    810 if(substring == '%%') {
    820 return '%';
    83 }
    84
    850 var leftJustify = false, positivePrefix = '', zeroPad = false, prefixBaseX = false, customPadChar = ' ';
    860 var flagsl = flags.length;
    87
    880 for(var j = 0; flags && j < flagsl; j++) {
    890 switch(flags.charAt(j)) {
    900 case ' ': positivePrefix = ' '; break;
    910 case '+': positivePrefix = '+'; break;
    920 case '-': leftJustify = true; break;
    930 case "'": customPadChar = flags.charAt(j+1); break;
    940 case '0': zeroPad = true; break;
    950 case '#': prefixBaseX = true; break;
    96 }
    97 }
    98
    990 if(!minWidth) {
    1000 minWidth = 0;
    101 } else {
    1020 minWidth = +minWidth;
    103 }
    104
    1050 if(!precision) {
    1060 precision = 'fFeE'.indexOf(type) > -1 ? 6 : (type == 'd') ? 0 : undefined;
    107 } else {
    1080 precision = +precision;
    109 }
    110
    1110 value = valueIndex ? a[valueIndex.slice(0, -1)] : a[i++];
    112
    1130 switch(type) {
    114 case 's':
    1150 return formatString(String(value), leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad, customPadChar);
    116 case 'c':
    1170 return formatString(String.fromCharCode(+value), leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad);
    118 case 'b':
    1190 return formatBaseX(value, 2, prefixBaseX, leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad);
    120 case 'o':
    1210 return formatBaseX(value, 8, prefixBaseX, leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad);
    122 case 'x':
    1230 return formatBaseX(value, 16, prefixBaseX, leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad);
    124 case 'X':
    1250 return formatBaseX(value, 16, prefixBaseX, leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad).toUpperCase();
    126 case 'u':
    1270 return formatBaseX(value, 10, prefixBaseX, leftJustify, minWidth, precision, zeroPad);
    128 case 'i':
    129 case 'd':
    1300 number = parseInt(+value, 10);
    1310 prefix = number < 0 ? '-' : positivePrefix;
    1320 value = prefix + pad(String(Math.abs(number)), precision, '0', false);
    133
    1340 return justify(value, prefix, leftJustify, minWidth, zeroPad);
    135 case 'e':
    136 case 'E':
    137 case 'f':
    138 case 'F':
    139 case 'g':
    140 case 'G':
    1410 number = +value;
    1420 prefix = number < 0 ? '-' : positivePrefix;
    1430 method = ['toExponential', 'toFixed', 'toPrecision']['efg'.indexOf(type.toLowerCase())];
    1440 textTransform = ['toString', 'toUpperCase']['eEfFgG'.indexOf(type) % 2];
    1450 value = prefix + Math.abs(number)[method](precision);
    146
    1470 return justify(value, prefix, leftJustify, minWidth, zeroPad)[textTransform]();
    148 }
    149 };
    150
    1510 return format.replace(regex, doFormat);
    152}
    153
    154// }}}
    155
    156/*
    157 * Local variables:
    158 * tab-width: 4
    159 * c-basic-offset: 4
    160 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
    161 * End:
    162 */

    nx/util/Format/currency.js

    LineHitsSource

    241module.exports = function(v, currencySign, decimals, end) {
    25
    260 var negativeSign = '',
    27 format = ",0",
    28 i = 0;
    290 v = v - 0;
    30
    310 if(v < 0) {
    320 v = -v;
    330 negativeSign = '-';
    34 }
    35
    360 decimals = decimals || NX.util.Format.currencyPrecision;
    370 format += format + (decimals > 0 ? '.' : '');
    38
    390 for(; i < decimals; i++) {
    400 format += '0';
    41 }

    430 v = NX.util.Format.number(v, format);
    44
    450 if((end || NX.util.Format.currencyAtEnd) === true) {
    46
    470 return NX.String.format("{0}{1}{2}", negativeSign, v, currencySign || NX.util.Format.currencySign);
    48
    49 } else {
    50
    510 return NX.String.format("{0}{1}{2}", negativeSign, currencySign || NX.util.Format.currencySign, v);

    55};

    nx/util/Format/number.js

    7%
    40
    3
    37
    LineHitsSource
    1/* vim: set expandtab tabstop=4 shiftwidth=4 softtabstop=4: */
    2
    3/*!
    4 * Next JS
    5 *
    6 * Copyright (c)2012 Xenophy.CO.,LTD All rights Reserved.
    7 * http://www.xenophy.com
    8 */
    9
    10// {{{ NX.util.Format.number
    11
    12/**
    13 * @class NX.util.Format
    14 */
    15
    16/**
    17 * @method number
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241var I18NFormatCleanRe;
    251var formatCleanRe = /[^\d\.]/g;
    26
    271module.exports = function(v, formatString) {
    28
    290 if(!formatString) {
    300 return v;
    31 }
    32
    330 v = NX.Number.from(v, NaN);
    34
    350 if(isNaN(v)) {
    360 return '';
    37 }
    38
    390 var comma = NX.util.Format.thousandSeparator,
    40 dec = NX.util.Format.decimalSeparator,
    41 i18n = false,
    42 neg = v < 0,
    43 hasComma,
    44 psplit;
    45
    460 v = Math.abs(v);
    47
    480 if(formatString.substr(formatString.length - 2) == '/i') {
    49
    500 if(!I18NFormatCleanRe) {
    51
    520 I18NFormatCleanRe = new RegExp('[^\\d\\' + NX.util.Format.decimalSeparator + ']','g');
    53
    54 }
    55
    560 formatString = formatString.substr(0, formatString.length - 2);
    570 i18n = true;
    580 hasComma = formatString.indexOf(comma) != -1;
    590 psplit = formatString.replace(I18NFormatCleanRe, '').split(dec);
    60
    61 } else {
    62
    630 hasComma = formatString.indexOf(',') != -1;
    640 psplit = formatString.replace(formatCleanRe, '').split('.');
    65
    66 }
    67
    680 if(1 < psplit.length) {
    69
    700 v = v.toFixed(psplit[1].length);
    71
    720 } else if(2 < psplit.length) {
    73
    74 /*
    75 NX.Error.raise({
    76 sourceClass: "NX.util.Format",
    77 sourceMethod: "number",
    78 value: v,
    79 formatString: formatString,
    80 msg: "Invalid number format, should have no more than 1 decimal"
    81 });
    82 */
    83
    84 } else {
    85
    860 v = v.toFixed(0);
    87
    88 }
    89
    900 var fnum = v.toString();
    91
    920 psplit = fnum.split('.');
    93
    940 if(hasComma) {
    95
    960 var cnum = psplit[0],
    97 parr = [],
    98 j = cnum.length,
    99 m = Math.floor(j / 3),
    100 n = cnum.length % 3 || 3,
    101 i;
    102
    1030 for(i = 0; i < j; i += n) {
    104
    1050 if(i !== 0) {
    1060 n = 3;
    107 }
    108
    1090 parr[parr.length] = cnum.substr(i, n);
    1100 m -= 1;
    111 }
    112
    1130 fnum = parr.join(comma);
    114
    1150 if(psplit[1]) {
    1160 fnum += dec + psplit[1];
    117 }
    118
    119 } else {
    120
    1210 if(psplit[1]) {
    1220 fnum = psplit[0] + dec + psplit[1];
    123 }
    124
    125 }
    126
    1270 if(neg) {
    1280 neg = fnum.replace(/[^1-9]/g, '') !== '';
    129 }
    130
    1310 return (neg ? '-' : '') + formatString.replace(/[\d,?\.?]+/, fnum);
    132};
    133
    134// }}}
    135
    136/*
    137 * Local variables:
    138 * tab-width: 4
    139 * c-basic-offset: 4
    140 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
    141 * End:
    142 */

    nx/util/Format/numberFormat.js

    50%
    2

    1
    LineHitsSource
    1/* vim: set expandtab tabstop=4 shiftwidth=4 softtabstop=4: */

    4 * Next JS

    nx/util/Format/parseBox.js

    8%

    1
    11
    LineHitsSource
    1/* vim: set expandtab tabstop=4 shiftwidth=4 softtabstop=4: */
    2
    3/*!
    4 * Next JS

    6 * Copyright (c)2012 Xenophy.CO.,LTD All rights Reserved.

    8 */
    9
    10// {{{ NX.util.Format.parseBox
    11
    12/**
    13 * @class NX.util.Format
    14 */
    15
    16/**
    17 * @method parseBox
    18 *
    19 * "write it"
    20 *
    21 * @param o {Object} xxx
    22 * @return {Object}
    23 */
    241module.exports = function(box) {
    25
    260 if(NX.isNumber(box)) {
    270 box = box.toString();
    28 }
    29
    300 var parts = box.split(' '), ln = parts.length;
    31
    320 if(ln == 1) {
    33
    340 parts[1] = parts[2] = parts[3] = parts[0];
    35
    360 } else if(ln == 2) {
    37
    380 parts[2] = parts[0];
    390 parts[3] = parts[1];
    40
    410 } else if(ln == 3) {
    42
    430 parts[3] = parts[1];
    44
    45 }
    46
    470 return {
    48 top : parseInt(parts[0], 10) || 0,
    49 right : parseInt(parts[1], 10) || 0,
    50 bottom : parseInt(parts[2], 10) || 0,
    51 left : parseInt(parts[3], 10) || 0
    52 };
    53};
    54
    55// }}}
    56
    57/*
    58 * Local variables:
    59 * tab-width: 4
    60 * c-basic-offset: 4
    61 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil

    22 * @return {Object}

    25

    27
    280 if(typeof precision == 'number') {
    290 precision = Math.pow(10, precision);
    300 result = Math.round(value * precision) / precision;
    31 }
    32
    330 return result;
